name: Lewis James
description: F1 genius with LeBron’s vertical leap — wins Grand Prixs while slam dunking on pit stops.

name: Curry Raikkonen
description: Deadliest 3-point shooter with the iciness of The Iceman. Fast, chill, untouchable.

name: Ayrton Senna
description: A master of rain and rhythm, Senna raced with soul and devotion, turning danger into poetry. His spirit lives on in every curve.

name: Magic Alonso
description: Old-school flair meets tactical brilliance — dishes no-look assists at the hairpin while managing tire deg. Charisma on the court, cunning in the cockpit.
